EmailTemplate.name: 04-16-21 HOS CMC and SA Release Notes.04-16-21 HOS CMC and SA Release Notes
EmailTemplate.subject: Command Center Release Notes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Release Date - April 22, 2021 Command Center Client and Secure Access, Version # 19.2.3 About this Release This release is a maintenance update of the Command Center and Secure Access Clients 19.2 General Release. This Client-only release is specifically being provided in the Azure US Data Center (NUA01-SEC) for easing the userâ€™s migration experience into the new data center. Enhancements Improved User Accessibility to Azure NUA01-SEC Allows for a non-admin user to login to the (19.2.3 or higher) Command Center and Secure Access clients after having installed or upgraded as an admin privileged user.
Updated the default data center for startup of the client after installation to now be the Azure NUA01-SEC data center. This default is only used if all else fails, allowing the client to provide feedback to the user to investigate an installation failure.
Reference to NCR Aloha Status Page for Outage Information Updated direction to the new https://status.aloha.ncr.com <[[https://status.aloha.ncr.com]]> page in the dialog presented when user's Command Center client cannot access the server.
English Documents for All Languages Updated document accessibility within Command Center client, regardless of language chosen at startup, to display the document in English. Notes The updated version will be installed on or after April 22nd for users who are already migrated to NUA01-SEC upon their next login to that client.
